page.title: 13VISIT TO ROGER ASCHAM SCHOOL
page.content: AT ROGER ASCHAM SCHOOL, WE SAW THE HANDICAPPED CHILDREN. I HELPED DAMIEN DO MATHS. HE HAD TO MEASURE HIMSELF. HE WANTED TO BE A FIREMAN AND SAVE PEOPLE IN FIRES. LAST WEEK IN SWIMMING, DAMIEN SWAM A WIDTH, AND HIS MUM GAVE HIM A SILVER CUP WITH HIS NAME ON THAT SHE HAD MADE. THE HANDICAPPED CHILDREN ARE VERY HAPPY, AND USE SPECIAL TYPEWRITERS, AND STAND UP IN THESE THINGS STRAPPED TO THEIR LEGS. DAWN HAS THIS THING ON WHEELS, WHICH, BY PRESSING A BUTTON, IT MOVES. NEAR THE END, THEY PLAYED A SONG FOR US. SARAH WAS ON THE RECORDER. I LEARNED ALOT ABOUT HANDICAPPED PEOPLE, AND WHAT THEY DO.
